text:
When President Trump banned travel from China to slow the spread of the coronavirus to the US, Joe Biden falsely called it "hysterical xenophobia."
 
Biden was wrong then, and he's been wrong on nearly every aspect of China for the last 40 years. https://t.co/JlJfvVnudI
